code: import'./App.css';import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{TabContext,TabList,TabPanel}from'@mui/lab';import{Box,Tab}from'@mui/material';import{Autocomplete}from'@mui/material';import{TextField}from'@mui/material';import Submission from'./Submission';import LeaderBoard from'./LeaderBoard';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(_ref){let{competitions}=_ref;const[value,setValue]=React.useState('1');const[selectedCompetition,setSelectedCompetition]=React.useState(null);const[ompetitions,setCompetition]=React.useState([]);const handleChange=(event,newValue)=>{setValue(newValue);};useEffect(()=>{fetch('/competitions').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setCompetition(data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching competitions:',error);});},[]);const handleCompetitionChange=(event,newValue)=>{setSelectedCompetition(newValue);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Autocomplete,{disablePortal:true,id:"competition",options:competitions,sx:{width:300},value:selectedCompetition,onChange:handleCompetitionChange,renderInput:params=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{...params,label:"Movie"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TabContext,{value:value,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{borderBottom:1,borderColor:'divider'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TabList,{onChange:handleChange,"aria-label":"lab API tabs example",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tab,{label:"Submission",value:"1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tab,{label:"Leader Board",value:"2"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TabPanel,{value:"1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Submission,{competition:selectedCompetition})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TabPanel,{value:"2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LeaderBoard,{competition:selectedCompetition})})]})]});}
